module.name: WebRTC Phone
module.changelog: *0.1* First Release (Ultrabeta) *0.1.b1* Fixed the look and feel using the dashboard css *0.1.b2* Added to the ARI(user) Page the Emergency Phone Menu *0.1.b3* Added to the ARI(user) Page the Local Web Phone Menu to Register with Local PBX Changed the Name of the Module. *0.1.b4* Configured to work without webrt2sip media gateway.
